entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Quispamsis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 01:13 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Freezing rain or snow at times mixed with rain beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain in the morning then to snow mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 then light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
